attributes.action: introduce a random selection system similar to the one used in the white house to give the prime minister a daily snapshot of public concerns
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in the USA the administration has instigated a system of providing the President with a daily random selection of ten communications from the general public that the President responds to directly.
the format of the communication is also random.
this system will not only provide a unique channel to the Prime Minister but also ensure that he has a daily comprehensive update on the abiding concerns of the nation.
